_sText:
================
Surf_Liberation

Made by MachINE
================

--=THE MAP IS NOT DECOMPILE PROTECTED=--

This map must be played on a 66 tickrate server with the following settings:

sv_airaccelerate 150
mp_freezetime 0

______________________________

A 7 staged surf skill map with 5 minigames, 1 jail, and 3 secrets.



There is a 7 minute time limit to complete the map in. The winner chooses which minigame will be played at the end.


______________________________

Random Facts:

-It takes 25 minutes to complete a 64 lightmaps compile of this map.

-It took more time to fix the issues with the map than it did to make all the stages.

-The colourblind minigame took more than all of the stages combined to make.

______________________________

Special thanks to all the beta testers and the Solidsurf community for much help along the way.

Skybox by Karatekafer
______________________________


Comments and constructive criticism would be much appreciated!

Enjoy!

-=MachINE=-

______________________________

Check out Notetwo.co.uk and forums.solidsurf.info

______________________________

VIDEO By Zentrix
